As an IDO launchpad SeedBox aims to bring both the investors and projects equal and favorable conditions. For our community members we offer a safe, transparent and fair way to participate in high yielding crypto-projects at the early stage, including VC’s without having a strong capital or special access. Regarding the projects, we suggest an alternative way of distributing allocations in a decentralized manner, widening the investors audience. Using the Polygon-based ecosystem to promote the development and funding projects built on Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Solan and Polygon chains in a completely decentralized way.

dapps.name: ChickenFarm
dapps.description: ChickenFarm is a simple smart contract, that has not a centralized owner, which acts as a MATIC reward pool, returning 5% of your MATIC in the pool on a daily basis, every day as long as there is still MATIC in the reward pool! Users can choose to sell their eggs (take their MATIC rewards) or incubate their eggs into new chickens as they accumulate. The Contract The ChickenFarm Miner contract is verified, open source, immutable, trustworthy and is visible on www.polygonscan.com What does all of that mean? It means that once the contract was deployed, the dev is no longer needed for the contract to continue operating as intended and in the case of MATIC ChickenFarm Miner the website isn't even needed. Everyone has access to read/audit and interact directly with the code and make their own decisions as they see fit. Once the contract was deployed it can't be stopped nor changed by anyone for any reason, not even the developer himself has access to change or take anything from the contract. MATIC ChickenFarm Miner is a decentralized tool that gives its users totally free access to its inner and outer workings so that they may make a well-informed decision on its usefulness to their intentions. All other work performed by the MATIC ChickenFarm Miner community and/or developers is purely optional, not necessary for continued operation and should be viewed as nothing more than charitable community contributions. Strategies & Information MATIC ChickenFarm Miner is for users who want long term profits and sustainability. It is not for people who want instant profits that ultimately Rekt others. MATIC ChickenFarm Miner is not to be confused with farms. Chickens can not be sold, eggs can be sold.

Dvision is segregated into 3 major platform pillars, which are NFT Marketplace, Meta-Space, and Meta-City:The Dvision Network is composed of three primary pillars: 1) Meta-City (Collection of Meta-Spaces) -  it’s a public Dvision World, where users can enjoy the metaverse with other users and engage in different events and activities. 2) Meta-Space (Tailored Virtual Estate) - a place where users can acquire and customize their personal LAND in order to establish and offer their own content within their virtual estate. dapps.description: Cosmolands can be used... For the construction of: bonus a sound argument for NFTS CosmoLand is the largest and most affordable NFT collection in the world, granting its holder the right to own land in the decentralized metaverse. - NFT from the CosmoLand collection is a kind of passport in the world of  MetaCosmo, by purchasing which you become a full citizen of the  metaverse - By owning digital real estate, people have all the opportunities that they have in real life, but much cheaper - The owners of the CosmoLand have absolute power over their VR Land and what they choose to do with it - CosmoLands are registered on the Polygon blockchain as NFT’s  Utility buildings directly in the game (mines, warehouses, etc.) Buildings for presentation (shops/stores, showrooms, etc.) Private buildings (clubhouses, private enterprises, etc.) A port to another world, game, or virtual reality Sales are divided into 7 stages At each stage, the value of NFT grows in accordance with the schedule Having  at least one NFT in each tier, you get a spaceship as a gift, which  will help you travel faster around the city and even to other planets  (when they are explored)  The  classic real estate investment process is time-consuming and costly.  Therefore, buying lands in the form of an NFT is a good alternative with  many advantages:  It is easy to do in one click It does not require additional expenses The liquidity of virtual property can be much higher than property in the real world You can use lands in the metaverse as efficiently as in reality (for example, rent, place your own billboards and shops)

dapps.name: Kea Farm

It was born from the desire to put in close connection the world of NFTs with real farming and as an educational way to introduce the world to agriculture and blockchain technology. We believe in empowering our players and giving them economic opportunities. We believe in a future where everyone can become a farmer to create own food.  Most of all, we have a dream that our platform can change the agriculture world forever.  Kea Farm is a new type of game that rewards players for the time and effort they spend both playing the game and growing the ecosystem. dapps.name: Multichain
dapps.description: Multichain was born as Anyswap on the 20th July 2020 to service the clear needs of different and diverse blockchains to communicate with each other. Each blockchain has its own unique services that it provides, its own community and its own development ecosystem. For our industry to reach the next level for consumers, we need a fast, secure, inexpensive and reliable way to exchange value, data and exercise control between the chains. The solutions developed by Multichain allow almost all blockchains to inter-operate. There is no restriction to Ethereum like chains (e.g. Binance Smart Chain), or different Layer 2 chains requiring finality to Ethereum (e.g. Polygon), or a network of Parachains (e.g. Moonbeam in the PolkaDot system), or Bitcoin types of chain (e.g. Litecoin), or COSMOS chains (e.g. Terra). These are either now all integrated, or on course for integration. With support for all ECDSA and EdDSA encrypted chains, Multichain is almost universally applicable as an interoperable layer. Multichain is now the leader in the cross-chain field, with a rapidly expanding family of chains (currently 26) and daily volumes well in excess of $100 million. Its sustained daily volume of more than $100 million, its Total Value Locked in excess of $5 billion and its thousands of daily users are testament to its popularity and security. We take pride that we are an open source protocol. Indeed to be properly described as decentralized as we are, it is essential to be open source, since otherwise how would anyone know that this was the case? We also have a strong belief in the principle of trustlessness. Anyone can use our crosschain services. They are controlled by code and there are no Externally Owned Addresses acting as a weak link.

dapps.name: Reality Cards
dapps.description: Reality Cards combines NFTs and a prediction market by letting users earn money and collect digital art pieces from their favorite real-world events. Events are available for a limited time on the platform and every outcome has its own Card. Users get to predict the outcome of an event by renting the corresponding Card at an hourly rate. There is only one Card for each outcome which means someone can at any time take over the ownership by paying an at least 10% higher hourly rental. Rentals from each Card get collected into the pot. Once the event is over, the pot is divided among all the users who rented the correct Card. The top users by time held get to collect their Card as a collectible NFT with different rarity.

Engage in many in-game professions, including trading, politics, war, piracy, and exploration! We invite you to explore a huge open world with endless possibilities on any platform (browser, mobile, pc).x survival MMORPG in an open world featuring indirect controls and an open economy with play to earn mechanics! Character Independency Character automated fights, work, starship flying, players give out general orders. dapps.description: Liquidifty provides different tools for NFT collectors. dapps.name: Metavault.Trade
dapps.description: Metavault.Trade is a new kind of Decentralised Exchange, designed to  provide a large range of trading features and very deep liquidity on  many large cap crypto assets. Traders can use it in two ways: - Spot trading, with swaps and limit orders. - Perpetual futures trading with up to 30x leverage on short and long positions. Metavault.Trade aims to become the go-to solution for traders who want to stay in control of their funds at all times without sharing their personal data. Its innovative design gives it many advantages over other existing DEXes: Very low transaction fees. No price impact, even for large order sizes. Protection against liquidation events: the sudden changes in price that can often occur in one exchange (“scam wicks”) are smoothed out by the pricing mechanism design relying on Chainlink oracles. All-in-one platform: spot and leverage trading.

dapps.name: Popcorn
dapps.description: In Decentralized Finance (DeFi), social good can be baked into the very foundation of a protocol without introducing any additional friction or extraordinary cost to the end user. At Popcorn, we do this by drawing a fee from the yield on our DeFi products; this yield is then funnelled to beneficiaries (chosen by the PopcornDAO community members) in the form of grants. The current blockchain (crypto) ecosystem is not ESG friendly. The future belongs to organizations that can achieve competitive returns while also prioritizing environmental, social, and governance issues. We believe investors are increasingly looking for investments that are ESG positive, and crypto is ideally positioned to provide high returns while making a positive impact. Our vision is to become the leader of ESG-friendly DeFi solutions by offering easy-to-use, high-yield investment products while being carbon neutral and committing our earnings to social impact and non-profit organizations.

dapps.name: RadioShack
dapps.description: RadioShack is a 100 year old brand embedded into the global consciousness, now on a mission to be the first protocol to bridge the gap to mainstream usage of blockchain and cryptocurrencies. As a first step, RadioShack is fixing the chaotic and dispersed nature of liquidity addition on today's AMMs. To solve this problem, RadioShack aims to significantly reduce the diameter of the graph of swappable tokens, and increase liquidity per pair. This will be achieved by using a single large-degree node (the RADIO node) to create what they refer to as The Starfish Topology: a pairing of the single large node with all swappable pairs.

But, unlike your average coins and tokens, Matic Miner allows you to stabilize and increase your TVL by taking long-term advantage of its compound feature. TVL is your current estimated "total value locked", an estimated value of your total miners. Once miners are hired, they work for you indefinitely, therefore your TVL can not be withdrawn in one lump sum. When you hire miners , they fill your barrel with Matic throughout the day with an estimated daily total of 3% of your TVL. You can pocket or compound the Matic accumulated in your barrel at any time. Pocketing too often will ensure a decrease in TVL, which in turn will ensure a decrease in your daily payouts. The value of miners continuously increases and decreases throughout the day, therefore it is normal to see your personal TVL fluctuating as your barrel continues to fill.

dapps.name: Marcobuds Racing Game
dapps.description: Marcobuds Game The Marcobuds game is a space racing game where only players with Marcobuds NFT’s can participate and win MATIC tokens. The game is fully decentralized. Participation Any MarcoBuds NFT holder can participate in the game. When you join a game, you will be required to add MATIC tokens as an entry fee. The entry fee will be determined later (e.g., 1, 3, or 5 MATIC). This is a multiplayer game and the 4 players are required before a game will start. The game will not start until 4 players join. The players do not need to be online as the MarcoBuds race each other. The game will start immediately when the fourth player joins. Winning The winner is selected via a randomized algorithm which is based off-chain and uses Chainlinks Verifiable Random Function (VRF). However, one factor that increases the chance of winning is the amount of time a MarcoBuds NFT plays. The longer time a MarcoBuds NFT spends playing, the more valuable it becomes as it raises the chance of winning within the randomization framework. For example, Player A joined 40 total game matches and thus has a slightly higher chance of winning than Player B who joined 35 games. So, the more games a player joins, the odds of winning increases slightly. However, in later phases, MarcoBuds upgrade mechanisms might be added. This would allow players to have a higher chance to win the match by introducing additional factors to train their MarcoBuds. Losing Everyone is a winner! Not only does the winner earn MATIC but those who lose the race will also get back a percentage of their MATIC as well. Watch Games The recent played games will be available for the public to watch. So, anyone can visit and watch the game at any time.

The grand prize is calculated as follows: (ticket price * ticket sales) * 0.85 3) The Bonus Draw Every ticket you buy has an additional chance to win in the bonus draw. The bonus draw is a big prize that is funded by diverting 5% of the prize pool every round for a number of rounds. The bonus draw occurs every n rounds, where n is the number of rounds that pass between each draw. The amount you can win in the bonus draw depends on how many rounds have passed. (ticket price * ticket sales) * 0.05 * n 4) Fees There is a 10% fee taken from winnings. The fee is distributed as follows: Dev 5% Treasury 5% The treasury will be used to maintain the site and contracts as well as to fund marketing of The Wheel and future projects.

As the ecosystem matures, the old ways of domain name investing have gone web3. Domain Name Token introduces domains as NFTs, breaking the chain of the monopoly of aftermarket businesses and liberalizing the way people invest and trade domain names. The first step is to get your domain on the blockchain, and then you are free to hold, use, or trade using the best market for you, with the lowest fees or the best interface. It's all decentralized now. We offer the infrastructure of holding the value of a domain name on the blockchain through a fully compliant ERC721 contract and a pledge to keep the underlying domain names in our custody safe. We always obey the actual ownership reflected on the blockchain. If you aren't a trader but own an online business, great news, now you can tap into decentralized finance opportunities, where you can put your domain name as collateral and access funds for your business through decentralized lending platforms. There is no shortage of ideas on what to do with your Domain Token. Put your domain to work and extract its true potential. Finally, while using our partners' services, you can continue serving your website's content while leveraging your domain name's value. So you can list your domain on an auction or use it as collateral without downtime on your website. Invest, trade, use or brag, domain names are assets in their own right and valuable items in any portfolio.

dapps.name: DEFY
dapps.description: DEFY is a play to earn NFT Blockchain mobile game. Immersing players (Operatives) in a metaverse that bridges the virtual and physical worlds, DEFY fuses hyper casual code breaking gameplay, learn-to-earn elements, real world exploration and AR adventures. DEFY’s in-game economy has been designed with scale and longevity in mind. A dual currency model is combined with an extensive set of customisable tradable game assets as well as multiple incentive mechanisms that can be leveraged by the players who are willing to put in the effort. DEFY will launch with both premium and free-to-play user pathways, which will greatly enhance user acquisition and retention. An innovative graduation scholarship model aims to revolutionise the pathway to flexible work freedom for P2E players. DEFY taps into pop culture to create a rich Player vs Environment (PvE) narrative that has operatives joining a revolutionary hacker organisation with the mission of keeping the metaverse open and out of the control of the evil tech oligarchy, Future Systems. As the game evolves, factions and Player vs Player (PvP) elements will add to the longevity of the game and complexity of the peer-to-peer economy.
